name: Ball of Wonder
description: Come with us to the magnicifent world of circuses.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista Processor: 1 GHz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 512 MB Storage: 70 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB Storage: 70 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Fun little game, at first I found it difficult but using keyboard 1/2/3 uses up the 'gifts' from the left menu and it fastens up destroying all those boxes :-D
